name: part_002
file: tmp_【#hololivefesEXPO25_DAY2】hololive 6th fes. Color Rise Harmony hololive STAGE3【チラ見せ】 [3OkprzHcirU]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: A montage of messages and fan art from viewers supporting the hololive 6th fes. 'Color Rise Harmony' event, set to background music.
A promotional segment introducing hololive-related products from Bandai and Bandai Spirits on display at the EXPO 2025 venue.

subtitles.original: バンダイ、バンダイスピリッツより、
ホロライブ・エキスポ 2025の会場にある特設ブースで
subtitles.english: at the special booth in the hololive EXPO 2025 venue,

subtitles.original: 展示中の商品をご紹介！
subtitles.english: we're introducing the products on display!
